questions.question: Under RA 10666 (Children's Safety on Motorcycle Act), the child must:
choices: Grasp the rider's waist, step and rest feet comfortably on foot peg, and wear standard protective helmet
questions.answer: Grasp the rider's waist, step and rest feet comfortably on foot peg, and wear standard protective helmet

questions.question: Under RA 10666, which of the following prohibits the rider to convey a child?
choices: Where a speed limit of more than 60 kph is imposed
questions.answer: Where a speed limit of more than 60 kph is imposed

questions.question: What is the fine for the first offense of violating RA 10666 (Children's Safety on Motorcycle Act)?
questions.answer: 3,000 pesos

questions.question: What is the penalty for the second offense of RA 10666 (Children's Safety on Motorcycle Act)?
questions.answer: 5,000 pesos

questions.question: Motorcycle riders must exercise safety and care at all times. They are required to wear:
questions.answer: Standard protective helmet

questions.question: You should not use a mobile phone while riding a motorcycle because:
choices: It is prohibited by law and it distracts your attention while driving
questions.answer: It is prohibited by law and it distracts your attention while driving

questions.question: When do you need to check your engine oil level?
questions.answer: When the engine is cold

questions.question: Using a backbone motorcycle, which stand do you need to use when parking overnight?
questions.answer: Center stand

questions.question: What is the maximum allowable width of the saddle box or bag?
questions.answer: 14 inches from both sides

questions.question: What is the maximum penalty for driving under the influence of liquor or prohibited drugs?
questions.answer: Perpetual revocation of license

questions.question: What should you do first before changing lanes?
questions.answer: Make signal

questions.question: When do you need to switch on your turn signal?
questions.answer: Before turning

questions.question: When is it legal to use the shoulder of a road when overtaking another vehicle?
choices: During normal circumstances you are not legally allowed to pass using the shoulder of a road
questions.answer: During normal circumstances you are not legally allowed to pass using the shoulder of a road

questions.question: What action can cause you to skid and lose control when you make an abrupt move, especially on wet and slippery roads?
questions.answer: Improper braking

questions.question: To help reduce air pollution, what should you do with your brakes?
questions.answer: Brake properly

questions.question: What is the authority granted by LTO to a person who desires to learn to operate a motor vehicle, valid for a period of one year?
questions.answer: Student Driver's Permit

questions.question: Signs that are round, inverted triangle, or octagonal and with red colored border are called:
questions.answer: Regulatory signs

questions.question: What sign will constitute an offense if it will be disregarded?
questions.answer: Regulatory sign

questions.question: Among the list, who are exempted from speed limits?
choices: Doctors or their drivers going to an emergency
questions.answer: Doctors or their drivers going to an emergency

questions.question: How can you avoid wasting fuel?
choices: By having your vehicle properly serviced and maintained
questions.answer: By having your vehicle properly serviced and maintained

questions.question: If you service your own vehicle, how should you get rid of the old engine oil?
questions.answer: Dispose it properly

questions.question: In case of a road crash involving physical injury, the first duty of the involved driver is:
choices: Attend to the injured person and call for help
questions.answer: Attend to the injured person and call for help

questions.question: When more than one driver arrives at a four-way stop, who has the right of way?
choices: The driver who arrived first should be the first to go
questions.answer: The driver who arrived first should be the first to go

questions.question: You are planning a long trip. Do you need to plan rest stops?
choices: Yes, regular stops help avoid mental and physical fatigue
questions.answer: Yes, regular stops help avoid mental and physical fatigue

questions.question: During periods of illness, your ability to drive may be impaired. You must:
choices: Be physically and mentally fit and do not drive after taking medicine
questions.answer: Be physically and mentally fit and do not drive after taking medicine

questions.question: How does alcohol affect you?
questions.answer: It reduces your concentration

questions.question: What is the meaning of 'beating the red light'?
choices: Driving faster upon seeing a yellow amber light
questions.answer: Driving faster upon seeing a yellow amber light

questions.question: What should you do if the road is wet?
questions.answer: Slow down

questions.question: Why are rumble strips installed across the road?
choices: To make you alert and aware of your speed
questions.answer: To make you alert and aware of your speed

questions.question: Which one is a mandate of LTO?
choices: Register roadworthy and emission compliant motor vehicles
questions.answer: Register roadworthy and emission compliant motor vehicles

questions.question: A pedestrian runs across the street when you're about to move off from a red light. What should you do?
questions.answer: Wait until the pedestrian crossed

questions.question: A driver while on a highway shall yield the right of way to:
questions.answer: Pedestrians crossing within a crosswalk

questions.question: When you approach a road work with a temporary maximum speed limit sign, what should you do?
choices: Comply with the sign at all times
questions.answer: Comply with the sign at all times

questions.question: You are entering an area of road works where there is a temporary no overtaking sign. You must:
questions.answer: Follow the sign as advised

questions.question: If you encounter emergency vehicles such as an ambulance, fire truck, and police cars on the road with sirens on, what should you do?
choices: Give way by pulling to the left or right side of the road
questions.answer: Give way by pulling to the left or right side of the road

questions.question: What should you do if a traffic police officer directed you to drive through a red light or stop sign?
questions.answer: You must obey

questions.question: It is more dangerous to turn left than to turn right because:
choices: Vehicles coming from opposite direction are faster
questions.answer: Vehicles coming from opposite direction are faster

questions.question: A driver must not park or stop at the side of the road of a stop sign when it is within:
questions.answer: 6 meters

questions.question: Double broken white lines on the road means:
choices: You are allowed to overtake on the left or right if there is no danger
questions.answer: You are allowed to overtake on the left or right if there is no danger

questions.question: Who is responsible for not overloading vehicle?
choices: The driver or rider of the vehicle
questions.answer: The driver or rider of the vehicle

questions.question: You can overtake in a highway if it has two lanes with:
questions.answer: Broken white lines

questions.question: What is the appropriate action if you feel sleepy while driving?
choices: Park at a rest stop and rest
questions.answer: Park at a rest stop and rest

questions.question: Where should you install your saddle bag or box?
choices: Not higher than the rider's seat
questions.answer: Not higher than the rider's seat

questions.question: The vehicle is parked if:
choices: It is at standstill and the engine is turned off
questions.answer: It is at standstill and the engine is turned off

questions.question: The proper hand signal for a left turn is:
choices: Left arm straight in horizontal position
questions.answer: Left arm straight in horizontal position

questions.question: Single white broken line on a two-way lane road means:
choices: It separates traffic moving in opposite directions
questions.answer: It separates traffic moving in opposite directions

questions.question: What should be done first before changing lanes?
choices: Check the traffic ahead and make signal
questions.answer: Check the traffic ahead and make signal

questions.question: A no stopping sign means you:
choices: Cannot stop unless directed by a traffic officer
Can stop if no one is around
questions.answer: Cannot stop unless directed by a traffic officer

questions.question: A traffic light changes from green to yellow as you approach an intersection. What should you do?
choices: Stop before the intersection or stop line
questions.answer: Stop before the intersection or stop line

questions.question: What must you do at a flashing yellow traffic signal?
choices: Drive with caution, consider it as a give-way sign
questions.answer: Drive with caution, consider it as a give-way sign

questions.question: Drinking alcohol before driving is one of the major causes of vehicular road crash because when a driver is drunk he or she is:
choices: Arrogant, talkative with poor judgment and reflexes
questions.answer: Arrogant, talkative with poor judgment and reflexes

questions.question: To perform things safely to drive on the road, one must have these documents ready:
choices: Valid driver's license and updated registration and insurance policy
questions.answer: Valid driver's license and updated registration and insurance policy

questions.question: You must not blow the horn of your vehicle unless:
choices: A moving vehicle may cause you danger
questions.answer: A moving vehicle may cause you danger

questions.question: Someone is waiting to cross at pedestrian crossing, they are standing on the pavement. You should normally:
choices: Stop, let them cross, wait patiently
questions.answer: Stop, let them cross, wait patiently

questions.question: When being overtaken by a car, what should you do?
questions.answer: Stay with the current speed

questions.question: A person with disability can possess a driver's license if:
choices: The driving conditions are indicated on the driver's license
questions.answer: The driving conditions are indicated on the driver's license

questions.question: The mandate of LTO is to register roadworthy and emission compliant motor vehicles, put order on the roads and to:
questions.answer: License quality drivers

questions.question: What is the maximum penalty for a habitual violator of RA 10666 (Children's Safety on Motorcycle Act)?
questions.answer: Revocation of driver's license

questions.question: Changing lanes at an intersection is:
questions.answer: Unsafe

questions.question: Parking is allowed if the vehicle is:
choices: Beyond 4 meters of a fire hydrant
questions.answer: Beyond 4 meters of a fire hydrant

questions.question: Under which of these circumstances is it permissible to use a mobile phone while driving a motor vehicle?
questions.answer: None of the above

questions.question: The temporary operator's permit authorizes the apprehended driver to operate motor vehicle for a period not exceeding:
questions.answer: 72 hours

questions.question: Road rage is violent anger caused by the stress and frustration involved in driving a motor vehicle in difficult conditions, especially when the driver is experiencing:
questions.answer: Heavy traffic or gridlock

questions.question: You may drive over a pathway:
questions.answer: To get into a property

questions.question: What does the law require you to do upon approaching an intersection with a stop sign?
choices: Stop and proceed when it is safe to do so
questions.answer: Stop and proceed when it is safe to do so

questions.question: A blue traffic sign says 60 kph. What should you do?
questions.answer: Drive at minimum of 60 kph

questions.question: What should you do when the brake lights of the vehicle in front of you activates?
questions.answer: Prepare to brake

questions.question: Where should you position your vehicle when you are planning to turn left into a minor road?
choices: On the leftmost part of the road
questions.answer: On the leftmost part of the road

questions.question: What do you mean by double white line?
choices: Separating lanes of traffic moving from opposite direction
questions.answer: Separating lanes of traffic moving from opposite direction

questions.question: The choice of speed may depend on:
choices: All of the above: roadworthiness of the motor vehicle being driven and skills of the driver
questions.answer: All of the above: roadworthiness of the motor vehicle being driven and skills of the driver

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of using the vehicle's horn?
choices: To give warning to avoid road crash
questions.answer: To give warning to avoid road crash

questions.question: You were invited to a dinner party. You know that you will have to drive afterwards. What is your best course of action?
choices: Not drink any alcohol at all
questions.answer: Not drink any alcohol at all

questions.question: While driving on a one-way direction, you intend to turn left into a minor road. On the approach you should:
choices: Keep well to the left of the road
questions.answer: Keep well to the left of the road

questions.question: What should you do if a railroad crossing has no warning devices?
choices: Slow down, check left and right of the railroad and then proceed with caution if clear
questions.answer: Slow down, check left and right of the railroad and then proceed with caution if clear

questions.question: A vehicle that enters a roadway from a driveway, alley, or a private road:
choices: Must stop and yield the right of way to traffic on the roadway and pedestrians
questions.answer: Must stop and yield the right of way to traffic on the roadway and pedestrians

questions.question: After turning right from an intersection into a one-way street, which lane should you choose?
questions.answer: Stay on the rightmost lane

questions.question: For motorcycles, what is the allowable measurement of custom-made registered boxes or carriers?
questions.answer: 2ft x 2ft x 2ft

questions.question: What should you do when passing a vehicle?
choices: Drive far away left of the vehicle
Drive fast the blind spots of the vehicle
questions.answer: Drive far away left of the vehicle

questions.question: What should be the maximum weight of your motorcycle?
questions.answer: 3x of my body weight

questions.question: Which of the following must be in good working order for your vehicle to be roadworthy?
questions.answer: All of the above

questions.question: How many bulbs are allowed for every auxiliary lamp?
questions.answer: Six (6)

questions.question: Before getting off, make sure that:
choices: the stand is properly in place
questions.answer: the stand is properly in place

questions.question: What should you check when merging with traffic?
choices: Signal light, battery light, drive chain
questions.answer: Speed, brake, side mirror, signal

questions.question: When can you stop upon a yellow box?
choices: When the flow of traffic reaches the yellow box
At no instance is a rider allowed to stop upon a yellow box
questions.answer: At no instance is a rider allowed to stop upon a yellow box

questions.question: How many passenger/s (back rider with standard helmet) are allowed to ride a motorcycle?
questions.answer: One

questions.question: What is the meaning of solid yellow line in the road?
choices: It is prohibited to change lane
It is just to separate lane
questions.answer: It is prohibited to change lane

questions.question: What should you do to avoid abrupt vibration or uncontrolled idling?
choices: Reduce speed then shift to low gear
Shift at low gear when going downhill
questions.answer: Reduce speed then shift to low gear

questions.question: Who are the road users?
questions.answer: Motorists and pedestrians, cyclists, passengers

questions.question: You are going straight ahead at a roundabout. How should you signal?
choices: Signal right just before you exit
Signal right on approach and then left to leave the roundabout
Signal left on the approach to the roundabout and keep the signal on until you leave
questions.answer: Signal right just before you exit

questions.question: Tricycle drivers are required to wear:
choices: shoes and pants while on duty
questions.answer: shoes and pants while on duty

questions.question: The loading and unloading zone is blocked and you cannot pull into it. Before unloading your passenger, what is the most important action to take?
questions.answer: Check both the traffic

questions.question: What is the allowable engine displacement to drive within the expressway?
questions.answer: 400 cc and above

questions.question: The hand brake in your motorcycle is there for:
questions.answer: none of the above

questions.question: What should you do before allowing passengers off your vehicle?
choices: Ask if they are ready to embark
questions.answer: Check side mirrors

questions.question: The maximum penalty for not wearing helmet is:
choices: P10,000 and confiscation of driver's license
questions.answer: P10,000 and confiscation of driver's license

questions.question: If you are riding with a group, what is the hand signal for "Hazard on Roadway on the Right"?
choices: Point to the hazard with your right hand
Point to the hazard with your left hand
Point to the hazard with your right foot
questions.answer: Point to the hazard with your right hand

questions.question: Under R.A. 11235, Motorcycle drivers are required to display _ on their motorcycle.
choices: Two (2) number plates, one on the front and one on the rear
One (1) number plate, on the rear
Three (3) number plates, one on the front, one on the rear, and one on the side
questions.answer: Two (2) number plates, one on the front and one on the rear

questions.question: Motorcycle drivers are advised to switch on their head lights:
questions.answer: day or night

questions.question: In which place/s must you not park your vehicle?
choices: Within six (6) meters of the intersection
Within 10 meters (32 feet) of a junction, infront of school, inside the parking mall
questions.answer: Within six (6) meters of the intersection

questions.question: How will a school crossing patrol signal you to stop?
choices: By giving you an arm signal
questions.answer: By displaying a "STOP" sign

questions.question: One requirement for a child to ride as passenger of a motorcycle along public roads of heavy volume and high density of fast moving vehicles and where the speed limit is more than 60 kph is:
choices: when the child's feet can comfortably reach the standard foot peg of the motorcycle
when the child to be transported is in a hurry to go to school
when the child to be transported has parental consent
questions.answer: when the child's feet can comfortably reach the standard foot peg of the motorcycle

questions.question: For motorcycles, in approaching downhill, a driver should:
choices: shift to neutral gear to conserve fuel
shift to applicable gear with respect to rider's ability
shift to lowest gear for more engine power
questions.answer: shift to applicable gear with respect to rider's ability

questions.question: You may not be seen by other motorists if:
choices: you are driving with head lights on
you are driving with other motorcycles
you are driving on the blind side of a vehicle
questions.answer: you are driving on the blind side of a vehicle

questions.question: If you are riding with a group, what is the hand signal for "Hazard on Roadway on the Left"?
choices: Point to the hazard with your left hand
Point to the hazard with you left foot
Point to the hazard with your right hand
questions.answer: Point to the hazard with your left hand

questions.question: Other than MTOP, Which document you need to post on your tricycle?
questions.answer: Identification Card and Fare Matrix

questions.question: This is one of the requirements for installation of fog lamp for motor-cycle:
choices: must be installed together with the switch of head lamp
separate switch independent of head lamp
must be installed together with the tail lamp
questions.answer: separate switch independent of head lamp

questions.question: It is the duty of the driver to see to it that:
choices: any items left inside the vehicle be returned to the passenger
any items left inside the vehicle be kept at home within 24 hours
questions.answer: any items left inside the vehicle be returned to the passenger

choices: not overtake if you are in doubt
speed through but flash your lights to oncoming traffic
questions.answer: not overtake if you are in doubt

choices: the child's arm can reach around and grasp the waist of the rider
the child passenger can reach the shoulders of the driver
the child can reach the knees of the driver
questions.answer: the child's arm can reach around and grasp the waist of the rider

questions.question: What is the meaning of inverted triangle with red border?
questions.answer: Yield the right-of-way

questions.question: When is the driver may be exempted from wearing helmet?
choices: Provided that the driver intends to use the motorcycle on a short drive only
Provided that long drive is not along the busy road
Short and long drive is never an exemption for not wearing helmet
questions.answer: Short and long drive is never an exemption for not wearing helmet

questions.question: What do you expect when you have a back ride?
questions.answer: Longer braking distance

questions.question: Ideally and in the absence of user's manual, tires can be inflated while it is cold with a pressure of:
choices: minus 4-6 psi of the maximum pressure
plus 2-4 psi of the maximum pressure
exact psi of the maximum pressure
questions.answer: minus 4-6 psi of the maximum pressure

choices: Placing the battery on the ground
questions.answer: Overcharging drained battery

questions.question: Having trouble shifting the gear may mean:
questions.answer: all of the above

questions.question: Motorcycle drivers are not allowed to use:
questions.answer: the sidewalks

questions.question: What is the penalty for using unregistered custom-made saddle bags or boxes?
choices: Monetary fine, impounding of motor vehicle, confiscation of the driver's license and unregistered saddle bag
Monetary fine, impounding of motor vehicle, revocation of driver's license
Impounding of motor vehicle, perpetual revocation of the driver's license
questions.answer: Monetary fine, impounding of motor vehicle, confiscation of the driver's license and unregistered saddle bag

questions.question: Saddle bags for motorcycles must not be:
questions.answer: higher than the driver seat

questions.question: What should you do when your front tire fails?
choices: Position yourself at the rear portion of the seat
questions.answer: Position yourself at the rear portion of the seat

questions.question: LTFRB is a government agency who has the authority to grant a Franchise or CPC to any public utility vehicle except for:
questions.answer: tricycle

questions.question: What should you do if two passengers want to back ride with you?
choices: Do not let two passengers back ride with you
questions.answer: Do not let two passengers back ride with you

questions.question: Starter Motor acts as a driving mechanism for:
questions.answer: engine to start

questions.question: A driver who sleeps early for the next day's work is a symbol of:
questions.answer: a professional driver

questions.question: Being a tricycle driver, you must follow the _ at all times to avoid passenger complaint for irregular charges.
questions.answer: Fare Matrix

questions.question: Where should you position your feet while driving a motorcycle?
choices: Tip toe on the foot rests
Gently on brake pedal and shifting lever
questions.answer: Firmly on the foot rests

questions.question: What should you check when you are preparing to slow down?
questions.answer: Vehicles infront and behind

questions.question: A driver must be able to:
choices: read, write, and knows how to interpret traffic signs
questions.answer: read, write, and knows how to interpret traffic signs

questions.question: Aside from brake rotors, brake pads, and brake pipes, what is the other essential part of a brake system?
questions.answer: Brake caliper

questions.question: Can you use blinker mode head light?
questions.answer: No

questions.question: Allowing passengers to ride on top or cover of a side car is penalized with:
questions.answer: monetary fines

choices: Get off and tow your motorcycle while on 1st gear
Slow down and skim your feet through the ground
questions.answer: Slow down and skim your feet through the ground

questions.question: If you are riding with a group, what is the hand signal for "Fuel Filling"?
choices: Left hand pointing to fuel tank
Left hand pointing to the nearest gasoline station
Right hand pointing to the nearest gasoline station
questions.answer: Left hand pointing to fuel tank

questions.question: What should be the color of a motorcycle's tail light?
questions.answer: Red

questions.question: Night, and rain is pouring. What should you do when two prospective passengers are trying to board your tricycle going different directions?
choices: Let the passenger with a nearest dropping point to board the vehicle and let the other passenger to wait
Let the two passengers board, if they want, and drop the nearest passenger first
The passenger who will pay more, shall be the first to board and the other passenger will wait until you come back
questions.answer: Let the two passengers board, if they want, and drop the nearest passenger first

questions.question: Under R.A. 10913, what is the maximum penalty for using his/her mobile phone while the motor vehicle is in motion?
choices: Monetary fine and confiscation of driver's license
Monetary fine and one (1) month suspension of driver's license
questions.answer: Monetary fine and one (1) month suspension of driver's license

questions.question: Diesel fuel has been spilled on the road. This will be particularly danger for:
questions.answer: motorcycles

questions.question: What should be the maximum height of your motorcycle?
choices: When two feet are touching the ground at a standing position
When two feet are touching the ground at a center stand
questions.answer: When two feet are touching the ground at a standing position

questions.question: You are driving behind a long vehicle which has a sign saying "Do Not Overtake Turning Vehicle". The long vehicle indicates that it is going to turn left. You:
choices: must let the long vehicle turn first
may pass the truck because it cannot turn left from the middle lane
may move to the left-hand side of the road pass the long vehicle
questions.answer: must let the long vehicle turn first

questions.question: What document do you need in order to operate your tricycle for business or for passengers?
questions.answer: Motorized Tricycle Operator's Permit (MTOP)

questions.question: How to make your tricycle to be as presentable as possible?
choices: Install accessories to attract more passengers
Limit installation of lights and sounds and other accessories
questions.answer: Limit installation of lights and sounds and other accessories

questions.question: Drive chain must be regularly checked by:
choices: applying enough oil or grease and adjusting enough tension
applying enough oil or grease then let the chain adjust itself
questions.answer: applying enough oil or grease and adjusting enough tension

questions.question: For motorcycle, passenger overloading may be defined as:
questions.answer: more than one passenger

questions.question: Can you use your hand-held mobile phone while driving a motorcycle?
choices: No, it is prohibited by law
Depending on the street, using it on the main road is illegal
questions.answer: No, it is prohibited by law

questions.question: What is the maximum penalty for vehicles that are not emission-compliant?
choices: Monetary fine and one (1) year suspension of Driver's License and three (3) months imprisonment
Monetary fine and one (1) year suspension of Motor Vehicle Registration and impoundment of motor vehicle
Monetary fine and one (1) year suspension of Driver's License and Motor Vehicle Registration
questions.answer: Monetary fine and one (1) year suspension of Driver's License and Motor Vehicle Registration

questions.question: Under R.A. 10054, what is the maximum penalty for not wearing a standard protective helmet?
choices: Monetary fine plus suspension of Driver's License
Monetary fine plus perpetual revocation of Driver's License
Monetary fine plus confiscation of Driver's License
questions.answer: Monetary fine plus confiscation of Driver's License

questions.question: One exception for a child to ride as passenger of a motorcycle along public roads of heavy volume and high density of fast moving vehicles and where a speed limit of more than 60 kph is:
choices: the child passenger can reach the shoulders of the driver
the child passenger requires immediate medical attention
the child passenger has parental consent
questions.answer: the child passenger requires immediate medical attention

questions.question: What should the motorcycle rider need to check?
choices: Saddle bag, top box, engine oil, transmission fluid, brake pedal, speedometer
Spare tire, brake pads and shoes, accelerator pedal
Motor vehicle overall condition before going anywhere
questions.answer: Motor vehicle overall condition before going anywhere
